title: The Tails of Pony 4 Precious
description: Cowboy Mike is Michael Eastwood, CEO and Chairman of the board for Pony for Precious.Cowboy Mike rescued Winston in 2016 and has since developed this amazing charity and in 2020 this book to educate children all across the country.Cowboy Mike began to get involved with horses when his daughter Katryna Eastwood, President of Pony 4 Precious, was a child and wanted to learn how to ride and compete in horse competitions.This book was developed for one reason: To educate children on miniature ponies and horses through free online education and training programs.
author: Michael Eastwood
